statements: DELETE FROM visitor_footfall WHERE site_id = 100 AND visitor_id = 200 AND visit_date = '2022-07-15';
DELETE FROM visitor_footfall WHERE location = 'Main Entrance' AND duration_minutes >= 60;
DELETE FROM visitor_footfall WHERE site_id = 1 AND visitor_id = 100 AND visit_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM visitor_footfall WHERE is_new_visitor = true AND location = 'Front Entrance';
DELETE FROM visitor_analytics WHERE total_visitors > 100 AND peak_hours = 'Morning';
DELETE FROM visitor_sites WHERE site_id IN (SELECT site_id FROM visitor_logs WHERE visitor_id = 1001);
